Title: Correlation between the Distribution of Software Bugs and Network Motifs
Published: International Conference on Software Quality, Reliability and Security
Elements_risk_assessment:
if a comment of a change is “Fix for segfault for contacts with
no notification time periods,” with the keyword “fix,” then we will identify it as a bug.
UseOF-SZZ: To obtain each bug in each version
Summary:
Analyze the bug distribution in four open source software projects downloaded from GitHub with complex
    network theory and focused on the correlation between software bugs and a specific type of software network structure
Outcome: functions containing bugs are more likely to be involved in feedforward loop motifs,
